contextual_notes: The user is exploring online grocery ordering for the first time, indicating a learning curve.
The conversation reflects a gradual increase in user confidence as they gather more information.
general_insights: Providing structured guidance and clear information can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Understanding user priorities and offering personalized recommendations can address specific needs.
Encouraging users to research and evaluate reviews can empower them to make informed decisions.
